text: Do folks here already know about the PDX Women In Technology mentorship program? It’s a pretty neat setup for getting mentors and mentees connected: <http://www.pdxwit.org/mentorship>

attachments.title: Mentorship
attachments.text: PDX Women in Tech exists to celebrate and connect professional women in the Portland area who work with, manage, lead or have an interest in technology.

text: I have been emailing with one of the folks over there to get more details, sounds like it’s open to women in all roles of technology - not just development. And the pace can be set as desired by both parties involved
